items.body:
Date: Tue, 11 Sep 2012 20:23:23 +0000
Attachments: COA DEFAULT_EMAIL.pdf
Hi Lesley,
Jeff had asked to have a sample of his beef jerky tested for nutritional value. Attached are
the results I just received, please let me know if I can be of further assistance.
Thanks,
Rachael Bova
Executive Assistant
T:
F:
to Stephen Hanson, President
B. R. GUEST HOSPITALITY
594 Broadway
Suite 803
New York, NY 10012
Facebook, Twitter, Foursquare, Flickr and Youtube at:

Green Restaurant Association

Francis has time to come tomorrow to show me how to make it!!! Jerky class a=yone? He will also bring you a taste of
his new jerky recipe from the resta=rant. And sends a warm hello. He is working at a restaurant called Cannibal=and
cooks... wait for it... Beef Jerky and Steak! He has time at 3pm tomorr=w if this is okay with you.

items.subject: Just
items.snippet: Just wanted to touch base about Jerky. JE said he was go=na start eating regular food again so he might be eating less jerky. That =aid he has 6 bags of it in the downstairs freezer for his next trip. I bel=eve it shoul…
items.body:
Just wanted to touch base about Jerky.
JE said he was go=na start eating regular food again so he might be eating less jerky. That =aid he has 6 bags of it in the
downstairs freezer for his next trip. I bel=eve it should be enough to get him through. Any other questions please let=me
know.
Thank you
Francis
Francis J. Derby
EFTA_R1_01216157

items.subject: Recipe : 2 Ib of jer
items.snippet: > THis is all I have unfortunately. I dont know what k=nd of meat he was using but Steve should know if you are not sure either.<=div> From: Date: November 21, 2012, 1:27:47 AM EST Subject: Recipe : 2 Ib of jer Recipe :…
items.body:
>
THis is all I have unfortunately. I dont know what k=nd of meat he was using but Steve should know if you are not sure
either.<=div>
From: Date: November 21, 2012, 1:27:47 AM EST
Subject: Recipe : 2 Ib of jer
Recipe : 21b of jerky
1/3organic tamari soy sause
3 tablespoon =weet soy sauce kecap Manis
2 tblsp ginger
2 tbs lemongrass ( fresh cut)
Sent from my iPad
», Karyna Shuliak
EFTA_R1_01224623

items.subject: Jerky
items.snippet: Date: Wed, 03 Oct 2012 15:16:56 +0000 Just wanted to touch base about Jerky. JE said he was gonna start eating regular food again so he might be eating less jerky. That said he has 6 bags of it in the downstairs freezer…
items.body:
Date: Wed, 03 Oct 2012 15:16:56 +0000
Just wanted to touch base about Jerky.
JE said he was gonna start eating regular food again so he might be eating less jerky. That said he has 6 bags of it
in the downstairs freezer for his next trip. I believe it should be enough to get him through. Any other questions
please let me know.
Thank you
Francis
Francis J. Derby

Date: Tue, 20 Nov 2012 16:53:44 +0000
M,
I will come to teach a jerky class and we can also coven- chocolate cream pie if you can agree to pay me through
this pay period. So I would then recieve my last full paycheck on the 29th of this month.
Francis
On Mon, Nov 19, 2012 at 7:11 PM, wrote:
Hi Francis
JE has asked me to email you and ask you whether you would be able to teach me to make the beef jerky.
Thank you
Francis J. Derb

From: francis derby <

I will come to teach a jerky class and we can also coven- chocolate cream pie if you can agree to pay me
through this pay period. So I would then redeye my last full paycheck on the 29th of this month.
Francis

items.subject: Jerky Recipe
items.snippet: Date: Sat, 22 Dec 2012 00:31:33 +0000 Pls see below..it's possible JE might like the jerky being sent by Steve. Looks like he changed it up a bit from the batch you currently have Begin forwarded message: From: Date: De…
items.body:
Date: Sat, 22 Dec 2012 00:31:33 +0000
Pls see below..it's possible JE might like the jerky being sent by Steve. Looks like he changed it up a bit from the
batch you currently have
Begin forwarded message:
From:
Date: December 21 2012 8:10:06 AM EST
To: Steve Hanson
Cc:
Subject: Re: Jerky Recipe
Thank you Steve but I have now been told it is the old way Francis was doing it that he likes best and not the
latest batch, so on LSJ is going to try and do it that way. I am in Europe but Jen is with him on the
island, if you need you can liaise with her about getting anything down
Thank you!!!
On Fri, Dec 21, 2012 at 1:07 PM, Steve Hanson < wrote:
Recipe yes. Later today but u have the type of beef that jeff likes- that was one issue of last
batch
But. I just made another batch - picking it up later today and was going to either send it to u or give
to eva. To bring- I was going to ask Jeff later if eva is still going in next few days
So can u ask which was he thinks be quickest/best. But at noon jerky is ready to be sent
And ill get u recipe asap
Sent from Steve Hanson's Blackberry
Proud to be the first national multi-concept restaurant group to be certified Green by the Green
Restaurant Association
Confidentiality Notice: This e-mail transmission and any file or previous e-mail attached to it is
intended to be viewed only by the party to which it is addressed and may contain valuable business
information that is confidential and/or otherwise protected from disclosure under applicable law. If
you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review, disclosure,
dissemination or use of any of the information contained in or attached to this transmission is
STRICTLY PROHIBITED. Thank you for your cooperation.
From:
To: Steve Hanson
Cc:
Sent: Fri Dec 21 04:44:28 2012
Subject: Jerky Recipe
Hi Steve
on Jeffreys island is requesting the latest beef jerky recipe as JE has asked her to try and make some.
He says the last batch that you made tasted different and I think he likes it as he would like her to attempt it.
Would it be possible to forward us the recipe.
Thank you

items.subject: Beef jerky
items.snippet: Date: Wed, 29 Aug 2012 13:23:40 +0000 Importance: Normal I'm flying on friday. I will bring jerky Original Message From: Karyna Shuliak To: Francis Subject: Beef jerky Sent: Aug 29, 2012 8:38 AM HI JE is asking to bring…
items.body:
Date: Wed, 29 Aug 2012 13:23:40 +0000
Importance: Normal
I'm flying on friday. I will bring jerky
 Original Message
From: Karyna Shuliak
To: Francis
Subject: Beef jerky
Sent: Aug 29, 2012 8:38 AM
HI
JE is asking to bring him more beef jerky on Fri. Are you also flying on Fri? If not, I would like to collect it from
you and take with me on the plane. Please let me know, thanks, Karyna.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry

items.subject: Beef jerky
items.snippet: Date: Thu, 30 Aug 2012 19:03:19 +0000 Yes, MI is the building number. Thank you! On Aug 30, 2012 2:58 PM, <I 66th and 2nd right? Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry > wrote: From: Karyna Shuliak Date: Thu, 30 Aug 2…
items.body:
Date: Thu, 30 Aug 2012 19:03:19 +0000
Yes, MI is the building number. Thank you!
On Aug 30, 2012 2:58 PM, <I
66th and 2nd right?
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
> wrote:
From: Karyna Shuliak
Date:  Thu, 30 Aug 2012 14:55:43 -0400
To: <I
Subject: Re: Beef jerky
That would be perfect if you leave it with the doorman, I will be home in about 2hrs.
On Aug 30, 2012 2:00 PM, < > wrote:
Beefjerky is still drying. About anothe r hour or so till finished. What is the best way to get it to you? I can
leave it with the doorman at your place?
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
From: Karyna Shuliak
Date:  Wed, 29 Aug 2012  09:39:53 -0400
To:
Subject: Re: Beefjerky
great, thank you!
On Aug 29, 2012, at 9:39 AM,
That's perfect. III be in touch about it.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
wrote:
From: Karyna Shuliak
Date:  Wed, 29 Aug 2012  09:38:19 -0400
To: <I
Subject: Re: Beefjerky
I can come after 3pm, as I will be in school before that, if it is late for you, you can leave it with Sue, and I
will collect it from her.
On Aug 29, 2012 9:35 AM, < > wrote:
It will have to be tmrw. Afternoon. I have some here now but I would like to make more.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
From: Karyna Shuliak
Date:  Wed, 29 Aug 2012  09:28:00 -0400
To: <I
Subject: Re: Beef jerky
Ok, then I will have to bring it with me, is it possible to collect it from you tomorrow or today?
On Aug 29, 2012 9:25 AM, > wrote:
Oh change of plans I will be flying out on monday.
I can get beef jerky to you tomorrow. So you can take it on friday.
 Original Message -
From: Karyna Shuliak
To: Francis
Subject: Beef jerky
Sent: Aug 29, 2012 8:38 AM
HI Francis,
JE is asking to bring him more beef jerky on Fri. Are you also flying on Fri? If not, I would like to
collect it from you and take with me on the plane. Please let me know, thanks, Karyna.
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
